content.text:
# 2025 Queensland International III – Men's singles

Alex Bolt
| runner   =  Wu Tung-lin
| score    = 6–3, 6–3
| edition  =
| before_year  = 2025
| before_name  = Queensland International II
| main_name  = Queensland International
| after_name  = Queensland International
}}
Adam Walton was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title.
Alex Bolt won the title after defeating Wu Tung-lin 6–3, 6–3 in the final.
Seeds
James Duckworth (quarterfinals)
#  Rinky Hijikata (first round)
#  Bernard Tomic (quarterfinals)
#  Jason Kubler (first round)
#  James McCabe (first round)
#  Alex Bolt (champion)
#  Dane Sweeny (semifinals)
#  Rio Noguchi (first round)
}}
